title: Can I recover my old account?

replies.body: I've edited out your account info for security reasons.  It sounds like you've tried a lot of steps to recover an old account, and we'd like to help too.  Just reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help!  We'll get back to you asap!
